grade_comment:
Grade: 95

Comment: The response provides a comprehensive explanation of the significance of Jesus' title "Son of Man" in relation to His dual nature as fully human and fully divine, emphasizing His role as the Messiah and His connection to humanity. It effectively addresses the concern by exploring the theological implications of Jesus' self-identification as the "Son of Man" and how it relates to our faith. The connection to Old Testament prophecy and the establishment of God's kingdom is well articulated, showcasing a solid understanding of Christian theology. Great job overall!
